fields.name: db_host
fields.description: Specifies the host address of the database server

fields.name: db_port
fields.description: Defines the port number on which the database server is running.

fields.name: db_user
fields.description: Represents the username used to authenticate and access the database.

fields.name: db_password
fields.description: Stores the password required for database authentication.

fields.name: db_name
fields.description: Specifies the name of the database to be connected to.

fields.name: app_server_port
fields.description: Specifies the port on which the application server will listen for incoming requests.

fields.name: CALC.OUT.PRECISION
fields.description: decides the number of decimal places to be used in the final response after performing a supported operation.

fields.name: minio_info/use_ssl
fields.description: Whether to use SSL for Minio
